Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for Price!
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: This is a powerhouse of a laptop! The HUGE 8 GB of memory is excellent for the multi-tasker. 750 GB Hard Drive is ample enough space for all your personal files. The Beautiful HD Display is Crystal Clear! and the HD webcam is Perfect for making videos and taking photos as well as video chatting with friends and family. Intel i3 processor, HD quality sound, for a great price!!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Rickster
Reviews.Content: Have had no issues with this laptop.  Has good memory and features.  Is a good value for a low dollar laptop

Reviews.Title: excellent laptop
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: It is a good team, which required for my line of work, it's pretty fast, a hard disk of a good size and I love windows 8., This laptop is a good option for those who want a team of good performance at an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: $375 great computer
Reviews.Author: dt
Reviews.Content: Has everything except for back lite keyboard, bought it at staples on sale.  Replaced my 5 year old Toshiba satellite, the mother board died. I hate windows 8.1 but times change. Isn't as nice as my wife's 2+ year old hp $1200.Happy with purchase was thinking about the new apple for $2500?I read the newspapers  and check email daily, Retired military, MBA.
